title: Episode 113 w/ Kareem "Biggs" Burke
itunes:title: Episode 113 w/ Kareem "Biggs" Burke
description:
N.O.R.E. and DJ EFN are the Drink Champs. In this episode the guys drink it up with founding member of Roc-A-Fella Records; Kareem "Biggs" Burke. The guys talk the making of Roc-A-Fella, Jay-Z, Kanye West, and a lot more. The guys are also joined by other special guests. --- Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/drinkchamps/support

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
